document_data.name: Famryn's Fine Oils
document_data.mainbody: '''Famryn's Fine Oils''' was an [[oil]]-making business in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Services: Famryn's produced various high-quality oils in the [[gnome]]-owned and [[human]]-operated workshop. It was linked by  [[merchants' map]] to [[the Arthane Armory]] in [[Waterdeep]], which bought "fire oil" to apply to newly made [[longsword]]s and other weapons before sale.
